title: 820-3476 sem energia
message:
It replaces the SMC, without result.
When I activate SMC_ONOFF, the MagSafe light turns green.

title: 820-3476 sem energia
message:
Magsafe light MUST be always green, if no battery connected.
Light should not react when pressing power button.
If reacts in your case, check SMC_TPAD_RST_L; MUST be steady high.

title: 820-3476 sem energia
message: SMC_TPAD_RST_L 3.3V, it is always high, until when it triggers SMC_ONOFF.

title: 820-3476 sem energia
message:
SMC_TPAD_RST_L shouldn't be affected by SMC_ONOFF_L.
Unless U4850 is incorrectly triggered at same time.
Disconnect keyboard and test using R5115/16 pads, instead of power button.
